CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 7, 1953, pg. 3, reads: "On Election Day - The Courier camera caught the left photo Tuesday afternoon while they were on a short lunch period at Crawford Grill Two. They are, going clockwise... Herman Slome, student in University of Pittsburgh's class in American Practical Politics, under a Falk Foundation Grant; Prothonotary David B. Roberts... Mr. Roberts subbed for the uncapacitated Democratic chairman of the Fifth Ward, Robert E. (Pappy) Williams, and was assisted by Matt Anderson and Paul F. Jones... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Herman Slome holding cigarette and Prothonotary David B. Robert seated in booth, with woman, possibly waitress, standing on right, and two men standing on right in Crawford Gill no. 2, for lunch break during 1953 election day
